message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but $11,000 is a significant drop from my initial offer.  This product holds substantial value, and I believe $12,500 is a fair compromise that reflects its worth. What do you say?
I appreciate your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
